short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances your experience in Google Scholar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It adds useful features such as:
- fully expand the list of publications with one click (instead of one click per 20 items).
- export a list of shown publications to file.

Please check the website for the source code and more information: https://scholarenhancer.github.io

Change log:
v0.0.9:
- Updates extraction of publication details to support the new behavior that loads details in a new page.
